# repeats

**Instance Property**

The cadence at which the alarm repeats, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
var repeats: Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence
```

## Describing an alarm

- **time**: The hour and minute at which the alarm alerts, relative to the device’s current timezone.
- **Alarm.Schedule.Relative.Recurrence**: Describes the cadence at which an alarm will repeat, if any.
